personal_info.name: Gourav Vashistha
personal_info.title: Java & Spring Boot Developer

about_me_detailed.introduction: Hello! I'm Gourav Vashistha, a passionate Software Engineer with over 3 years of experience in developing scalable, high-performance applications. Currently working at Infinite Computer Solutions, I specialize in full-stack development with a strong focus on backend technologies.
about_me_detailed.professional_journey: My journey in software development began during my Computer Engineering studies at Echelon Institute of Technology. Since then, I've had the privilege of working with industry-leading companies like Capgemini and Infinite Computer Solutions, where I've contributed to projects serving millions of users.
about_me_detailed.expertise: I excel in building robust backend systems using Java and Spring Boot, developing responsive frontend applications with React.js, and architecting microservices-based solutions. My experience spans across various domains including banking, e-commerce, and enterprise software development.
about_me_detailed.passion: I'm passionate about writing clean, maintainable code and following industry best practices. I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest technologies and trends in software development.

achievements: 25% faster bug resolution time
35% improvement in user satisfaction
Streamlined communication between teams

Enhanced team productivity and collaboration

projects.name: VOTE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
projects.description: Scalable voting platform built with microservices architecture for secure and efficient elections.
projects.detailed_description: Architected and developed a comprehensive voting management system using microservices architecture. The system supports multiple concurrent elections with real-time results and secure user authentication.
achievements: Modular and scalable microservices architecture
Zero downtime during peak usage periods
Secure vote management with audit trails
Real-time results dashboard with live updates
Support for concurrent elections
High availability with 99.9% uptime
technical_highlights: Spring Boot microservices with service discovery

achievements: Handled 1,000+ product listings efficiently
Processed 200+ test transactions successfully
